alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Graham; Norton; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 1:19AM CDT until August 05 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Norton County in northwestern Kansas... Northeastern Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Southern Decatur County in northwestern Kansas... Northern Graham County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 118 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Prairie View to 3 miles northeast of Jennings to 8 miles southwest of Oberlin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1259 AM CDT, a wind gust of 64 mph was measured Norton Municipal Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lenora, Selden and Dresden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
